name: Mauricio Morales
desc: Co-founder. Star dad and shot caller. At one of the highest-cap infrastructure-as-a-service unicorns in NYC. Bullish on steaks.

name: Kamadez
desc: Heads partnerships and community management. Minecraft and Rocket League maxi. Staunch advocate of decentralization, user empowerment, and a less restrictive Web3.

name: Arial Jade
desc: Loves cats and Dr. Pepper. Also stars. Previously freelanced for several Web2 and Web3 brands. She’d tell you which but she’d have to kill you.
